definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: They can also be worse when walking barefoot or wearing flat shoes.
sentences.chinese: 光脚或者穿平底鞋走路也可能如此。

sentences.english: Fully populated each Barge drive bay contains 96 drives.
sentences.chinese: 完全稀疏的每只平底船开湾包括96个驱动器。

sentences.english: They placed dirt and rocks in a pan and then filled it about half way with water.
sentences.chinese: 他们在平底锅安置了土和岩石然后填装了一半。

sentences.english: She emptied the bottle of milk into a saucepan.
sentences.chinese: 她把瓶中的牛乳全倒进平底锅。

sentences.english: Pans are not as handy as works for Chinese cooking.
sentences.chinese: 做中国菜时，平底锅不如中式炒菜锅好用。

sentences.english: Put red peppers in a pan and burn their skin on low fire.
sentences.chinese: 把整个红椒放到平底锅里，用小火慢慢将皮烤焦。

sentences.english: Pour the water into a pan and bring it to boil.
Put it into the pan with potatoes – boiled and mashed.
sentences.chinese: 将它倒入装有煮熟捣碎的土豆的平底锅内。

sentences.english: Bring cranberry juice to boil in large saucepan.
sentences.chinese: 把酸果蔓汁倒入平底锅中煮沸。

sentences.english: Pour the ingredients into a twenty-five cubic inch pan.
sentences.chinese: 再把这些配料倒进一个25立方英寸的平底锅中。

sentences.english: Finely chop the almonds and prepare a sheet pan with parchment.
sentences.chinese: 把杏仁剁碎，准备一个羊皮纸内衬平底锅。

sentences.english: Sentences: Place the pan on the stove.
sentences.chinese: 把平底锅放在天然气灶上。

sentences.english: In this paper, the structure and construction of the flat bottom of short-hole shrinkage stope with grid fence attached are studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了浅孔留矿法平底栏栅底部结构及其施工。

sentences.english: Even gondoliers tend to hang up their paddles early.
sentences.chinese: 即便是那些划平底船的船夫也早早就准备着收桨了。

sentences.english: Toast the dried chillies in a hot pan until they start to singe .
sentences.chinese: 将干辣椒放在烧热的平底锅里煸至微焦。

sentences.english: Her flat black suede boots and cardigan help make this cooler weather appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 黑色平底的山羊皮长靴和羊毛衫让秋凉望而却步。

definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
